caption.p: The study area and the distribution of the flux tower sites (a), the vegetation types (b), and the spatiotemporal changes of cropland from 2001 to 2012 (c). EC: Eddy covariance flux tower station. FK: Fukang station; KZ-Ara: Aral Sea station in Kazakhstan; KZ-Bal: Balkhash Lake station in Kazakhstan; WLWS: Wulanwusu station. ENF: Evergreen needleleaf forest; EBF: Evergreen broadleaf forest; DBF: Deciduous broadleaf forest; DNF: Deciduous needleleaf forest; MF: Mixed forest; CSH: Closed shrub; OSH: Opened shrub; SAV: Savanna; WSA: Woody savanna; GRA: Grassland; WET: Wetland; CRO: Cropland.
